instruction: Explain to me how a computer virus can be contracted.
output: Computer viruses can be contracted in various ways. Common methods include downloading files from untrustworthy websites, opening email attachments from unknown sources, and visiting websites that contain malicious code. Additionally, sharing unsecured computer systems with others can allow for the virus to spread from one system to another.

instruction: Name three technological gadgets of a modern artist.
output: A digital tablet, a computer, and a digital audio workstation are three technological gadgets of a modern artist.

instruction: Take the following sentence and remove any unnecessary words.
input: I really really really want this.
output: I really want this.

instruction: Make a list of seven new ideas for a project.
output:
1. Create an interactive online game.
2. Develop an app for tracking the progress of a project.
3. Develop a multimedia documentary on a relevant issue.
4. Create an online survey to collect opinions.
5. Create a website to provide education on a specific topic. 
6. Design a virtual reality experience related to the project.
7. Create a video series to promote the project.

instruction: Provide two examples of a synonym for a noun.
output: Synonyms for "dog" are canine and hound. Synonyms for "tree" are plant and shrub.

instruction: Select an appropriate size for a skateboard given the customer's height.
output: For a person of a height of 5 feet 5 inches, we recommend a skateboard size of 7.75 inches.

instruction: Arrange components for a laptop assembly.
input: Motherboard, Processor, Memory, Hard Drive, Keyboard.
output: For laptop assembly, install the motherboard first, followed by the processor, followed by the memory, followed by the hard drive and the last step is to attach the keyboard.

instruction: Tag this text as positive or negative.
input: The summer weather was undeniably terrible today.
output: Tagged as negative.

instruction: Offer an alternative solution.
input: The customer wants to buy a laptop but has limited budget
output: An alternative solution would be to buy a used laptop which is usually more affordable than getting a new one.

instruction: Suggest 3 equipment for camping
output: Suggested equipment for camping include a tent, a sleeping bag and a camp stove.

instruction: Offer 3 tips about productivity
output: Three tips for improving productivity are: have a specific goal in mind, set a budget for time and resources, and create a schedule with milestones.

instruction: Edit this text for grammar and spelling mistakes
input: My faverite food is appel pie
output: My favorite food is apple pie.

instruction: Describe the features of an Instagram account
output: An Instagram account allows users to post images and videos, interact with followers and other users, follow other accounts, search and explore content, and get insights on performance.

instruction: Provide a way to save the customer money
input: The customer is looking for a laptop but has limited budget.
output: An effective way to save money when purchasing a laptop is to purchase a used laptop, which is usually significantly cheaper than buying a new one.

instruction: Compare the climate of two cities.
output: Tokyo has significantly warmer temperatures compared to New York, it also has more humid weather due to its proximity to the ocean, while New York has cooler temperatures and less humidity.

instruction: Write a sports-themed haiku.
output:
Racing to the goal -
Competition among the brave 
Victory cries aloud.

instruction: Name a Shakespeare play.
output: A Midsummer Night's Dream

instruction: List the characteristics of a hydrogen atom.
output: A hydrogen atom consists of a single proton and a single electron. It has no neutrons. It has a low atomic mass, is not very reactive, and has a relatively low ionization energy.

instruction: Give two reasons why the USA has the largest economy in the world.
output: The United States has the largest economy in the world for a few reasons. First, it has a highly developed and diversified economy that produces and trades goods and services in virtually every sector. Secondly, it has the largest consumer market in the world, with an abundance of resources and access to capital for businesses.

instruction: Write a story about a penguin fallen in love.
output:
Once upon a time, there lived a lonely little penguin who had never been in love. One day, while out checking the ice for food, he spotted a beautiful female penguin in the distance. He was immediately besotted with her and couldn't take his eyes off her. After a few days of gathering courage, he mustered the strength to introduce himself. To his shock, she felt the same and they soon became inseparable. Despite the tough winter storms and the long distances they had to travel, they held each other's flippers tight and never looked back.

And so, the two loved each other for eternity.

instruction: Name the type of triangle based on their angles and sides.
output: The triangle has two acute angles and one obtuse angle, so it is an obtuse scalene triangle.

instruction: Simplify the expression below:
Describe the South American climate.
output: The climate of South America is incredibly varied, ranging from the immense rainforests of the Amazon to the arid deserts of Peru and Chile. Most areas experience a tropical climate, with distinct wet and dry seasons, while the southern areas experience more temperate weather, with cooler winters and warmer summers. Generally, areas closer to the equator experience higher temperatures and more intense rainfall.

instruction: Write a tip to make cooking easier.
output: One tip to make cooking easier is to develop a meal plan for the week and make sure to stick to it. This means having ingredients ready to go and prepping any elements of the dish that can be done in advance. That way, when it comes time for the actual meal preparation, a lot of the work is already done, so it's easy to quickly assemble the dish.

instruction: Suggest 5 new words to describe the color yellow.
output: Amber, Canary, Mustard, Maize, Sunbeam.
